Q1.1:

I think LDA will cluster words in same topic together. The k value is how many topics there are to LDA. 
Q1.2:

5
Reason for choosing 5: When K value is less then 5, in some groups I find there are some less related words. I think k = 5 cluster words better then other k value.

Q2.2

0: 0.001416, 1: 0.058074, 2: 0.001416, 3: 0.497167, 4: 0.001416, 5: 0.440510
##Comment: I think the result does make sense because the main focus is on topic 5, topic 1, topic 3. The topic for each topic is in some sense related. They are realated to algorithm, system and computers. It is pretty reasonable for the small sample of test. I would recommand large scale of exeperiment to find out if it really make sense or not.


Q3

	NIPS 2000, the popular topics are topic 0, 3, 6
	NIPS 2006, the popular topics are topic 2, 3, 9
	NIPS 2012, the popular topics are topic 2, 3
	I think it is better to first use LDA to find the most popular topic in these years and rank them with their  frequences. Then should look at the compare the difference with the topics to see how the treads change with time.
